TUNNELING
[ProxyMobileIPv6]

Defines

Functions

Detailed Description

PMIP Tunnel management (Creation/Deletion)

Function Documentation

int pmip_tunnel_add ( struct in6_addr *  local,
struct in6_addr *  remote,
int  link 
)

Create an IP6-IP6 tunnel between local and remote.

Parameters:
[in] local Local tunnel address.
[in] remote Remote tunnel address.
[in] link Interface id
Returns:
Returns interface index of the newly created tunnel, or negative on error.
int pmip_tunnel_del ( int  ifindex  ) 

Deletes a tunnel identified by ifindex.

Parameters:
[in] ifindex Tunnel interface index
Returns:
Returns negative if tunnel does not exist, otherwise zero.
